item.title: 阿尔伯塔号快船将在圣诞节后为纽约带来小雪
item.description: 周五，一场被称为 "阿尔伯塔快船"（Alberta Clipper）的快速移动风暴将把冷空气推向美国东北部和大西洋中部各州，在纽约市降雪，然后在华盛顿特区转为降雨。【原文：A fast moving storm dubbed the Alberta Clipper will push freezing air into the US Northeast and mid-Atlantic states Friday, dropping snow on New York City before turning to rain in Washington, D.C.】

item.title: 2025 年的气候好消息
item.description: 你可能会认为 2025 年对气候来说都是坏消息。排放量增加了，企业在气候方面的进展放缓了，法规也减少了。但也有气候方面的胜利。【原文：You’d be forgiven for thinking 2025 was all bad news for the climate. Emissions were up, corporate climate progress slowed down and regulations were rolled back. But there were climate wins, too.】

item.title: 南加州面临圣诞洪灾的 "巨大危险
item.description: 南加州居民周三正准备应对一场强大的冬季风暴，预计这场风暴将给该地区带来危险的洪水以及岩石和泥石流，威胁到财产安全，并阻碍假日旅行计划。【原文：Residents of Southern California were bracing Wednesday for a powerful winter storm forecast to bring dangerous flooding as well as rock and mudslides to the region, threatening property and snarling holiday travel plans.】

item.title: 核电开发商建议将海军反应堆用于数据中心
item.description: 德克萨斯州的一家电力开发商提议重新利用海军战舰上的核反应堆为美国电网供电，因为特朗普政府正努力为人工智能的蓬勃发展确保大量能源。【原文：A Texas power developer is proposing to repurpose nuclear reactors from Navy warships to supply the US grid as the Trump administration pushes to secure massive amounts of energy for the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.description:

】

item.title: 中国电动汽车电池巨头正努力寻找新道路
item.description:
CATL以廉价、高效的电池充斥着国内市场。它希望在海外采取同样的做法，但欧洲政客和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump—）阻碍了它的发展。【原文：

CATL flooded the domestic market with inexpensive, efficient batteries. It wants to do the same overseas, but European politicians—and Donald Trump—stand in its way.

】

item.title: 康涅狄格州州长称风力发电场之争将增加电费支出
item.description: 康涅狄格州州长内德-拉蒙特（Ned Lamont）抨击特朗普政府下令停止海上风电项目的工作，称这将破坏降低电费的努力。【原文：Connecticut Governor Ned Lamont blasted the Trump administration’s order halting work on offshore wind projects, saying it will undermine attempts to lower power bills.】

item.title: 加利福尼亚州遭受强风暴袭击，正值假日旅游高峰期
item.description: 加利福尼亚州正被多场冬季风暴淹没，这些风暴将给该州带来大量降雨和危险的狂风，威胁着圣诞节期间的旅行者。【原文：California is being inundated with multiple winter storms that will drench the state with rain and deliver dangerous winds, threatening travelers during the Christmas holiday.】

item.title: 民主党人尝试 "以上皆有 "的能源主张
item.description: 多年来，"以上皆有 "的能源战略一直是共和党人的默认立场，甚至成为保护化石燃料利益的挡箭牌。但随着唐纳德-特朗普总统将共和党改造成一个全力支持化石燃料的政党，他们在很大程度上放弃了这一立场。【原文：An “all of the above” energy strategy was Republicans’ default position for years, even as it acted as a shield to protect fossil fuel interests. But they’ve largely abandoned it as President Donald Trump has remade the party into one of full-throated support for fossil fuels.】

item.title: Equinor、Orsted 就海上风电暂停问题与美国接触
item.description: Equinor ASA 和 Orsted A/S表示，在特朗普政府发布新一轮停工令后，他们正就与海上风电项目相关的安全问题与美国当局接触。【原文：Equinor ASA and Orsted A/S said they are engaging with US authorities over security concerns tied to their offshore wind projects, after the Trump administration issued another round of work suspension orders.】

item.title: 强风暴逼近洛杉矶，洛杉矶疏散部分居民

item.title: 缺水问题迫在眉睫，澳大利亚有望迎来海水淡化热潮
item.description: 在平均降雨量不断减少的情况下，澳大利亚正按计划大幅提高海水淡化能力，将海水转化为淡水，以满足不断膨胀的人口需求。【原文：Australia is on track for a significant expansion of desalination capacity — converting seawater to freshwater — to meet the needs of a swelling population at a time of declining average rainfall.】

item.title: China’s Weather Superpower Bid Takes Aim at Top AI Model Dataset
item.description: China’s push to be a weather superpower has seen authorities accelerate efforts to end reliance on a European dataset, promoting a homegrown alternative for the era of artificial intelligence-fueled forecasting.

item.title: US Suspends Offshore Wind Leases, Citing National Security
item.description: The Trump administration is suspending leases to five wind farms under construction off the US East coast over national security concerns, the latest move in the government’s broad assault on renewable energy.

item.title: 纽约的拥堵定价正在发挥作用。五张图表展示
item.description: 将近一年前，纽约市开始实施一项备受争议的计划，对进入曼哈顿一些最繁忙街道的司机收费。这是美国首个拥堵收费计划，其目的是改善空气质量，并筹集 150 亿美元用于升级该市庞大且老化的交通系统，同时缓解该市经常堵塞的部分地区的交通。【原文：Nearly a year ago, New York City embarked on a controversial program to toll drivers entering some of Manhattan’s busiest streets. The goal of the congestion pricing plan, the first of its kind in the US, was to improve air quality and raise $15 billion to upgrade the city’s extensive — and aging — transit system, all while relieving traffic in a routinely clogged part of town.】

item.title: 削减 ESG 未能平息紧张局势，欧盟再次面临美国的怒火

item.title: 尽管核聚变仍遥不可及，投资者为何仍将赌注押在核聚变上？
item.description: 核聚变长期以来一直吸引着科学界的想象力。人们的梦想是利用为恒星提供动力的相同过程来生产廉价、充足和无碳的电力。【原文：Nuclear fusion has long captured the scientific imagination. The dream is to harness the same process that powers stars to produce cheap, abundant and carbon-free electricity.】

item.title: 世界最大地球科学会议的五大收获
item.description: 今年，全球最大的地球科学会议背景令人震惊，特朗普政府宣布计划关闭一个标志性的气候研究实验室。可以说，这改变了会议的基调。【原文：The world’s biggest Earth science conference had a shocking backdrop this year, with the Trump administration announcing that it plans to close an iconic climate research lab. Suffice to say, that changed the tone of the gathering.】
